name: Protectron
description:
Protectron

Protectron is a retro-style arcade game where you have to defend the cities below you in your ship for as long as possible. Meteors are raining down threatening to destroy your cities, and you have to stop them. Your ship is indestructible and you can either ram the meteors or shoot them to deflect them away from your cities. There is no victory objective, you simply survive as long as possible before being overwhelmed.
